org.jasig.cas.util

Class LockedOutputStream

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.io.OutputStream
      • java.io.FilterOutputStream
        • java.io.BufferedOutputStream
          • org.jasig.cas.util.LockedOutputStream
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Closeable, java.io.Flushable, java.lang.AutoCloseable

    public final class LockedOutputStream
extends java.io.BufferedOutputStream
    Buffered output stream around a file that is exclusively locked for the lifetime of the stream.
    Since:
    4.1.0

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class java.io.BufferedOutputStream

        buf, count

      • Fields inherited from class java.io.FilterOutputStream

        out

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      LockedOutputStream(java.io.FileOutputStream out)
      Creates a new instance by obtaining a lock on the underlying stream that is held until the stream is closed.

    • Constructor Detail

      • LockedOutputStream

        public LockedOutputStream(java.io.FileOutputStream out)
                   throws java.io.IOException
        Creates a new instance by obtaining a lock on the underlying stream that is held until the stream is closed.
        Parameters:
        out - Output stream.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If a lock cannot be obtained on the file.
